ygData.subject: RE: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: i think he s talking about the dwarves and the fact that there is no faction hit when you kill them.
ygData.messageBody:
i think he's talking about the dwarves and the fact that there is no
faction hit when you kill them.


At 07:53 PM 10/20/99 GMT, you wrote:
>From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
>hmmmm , i know sometimes Krak Windchaser would attack us in Aviak City...boy
>did that upset ppl, but he don't give exp or loot...but sometimes ya gotta
>kill him....but thats my only experience with anything like that.
>
>Sianne
>
>
>
